name: Red Velvet 'Box' Cookies Recipe Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: red velvet cake mix, egg, vegetable oil, powdered sugar
recipeIngredient: 1 box of Red Velvet Cake Mix cookies
recipeInstructionSteps: Mix everything except the powdered sugar into a bowl (Batter will be thick).
Spoon into balls and roll in the powdered sugar.
Place on cookie sheets leaving about 2 inches (5 cm) between cookies. Level with a glass.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes until cookies brown SLIGHTLY on the edges.
